companyDescription: Korea's largest telecommunications company providing mobile, internet, and digital services

businessFunctions.description: Real-time agent assistance and automated post-call processing to enhance service quality and reduce agent stress

useCases: Real-time document search and answers for agents
Automated post-call processing including summarization and sentiment analysis
Intelligence augmentation for customer service agents
implementation.approach: Human-in-the-loop technology with custom RAG model integration
implementation.integrationMethod: Custom integration with in-house RAG model

quantitativeMetrics.context: Quality rating of LLM responses by human agents in in-call assistance
quantitativeMetrics.source: The quality rating of LLM responses by human agents in in-call assistance increased by 34%

quantitativeMetrics.context: Decrease in proportion of low-quality responses in Telco fine-tuned model vs base model
quantitativeMetrics.source: The proportion of low-quality responses in the Telco fine-tuned model decreased by 68% compared to the base model

quantitativeMetrics.context: Overall performance improvement of Telco LLM system
quantitativeMetrics.source: This integration significantly enhanced service capabilities, boosting the performance of the Telco LLM from 3.3 to over 4.3

quantitativeMetrics.context: Response quality compared to human agents
quantitativeMetrics.source: The response quality in post-call processing is approximately 89% of that of human agents

qualitativeBenefits.description: Technology designed to make overwhelmed agents' lives better through intelligence augmentation
qualitativeBenefits.source: We recognized that our customer service agents are stressed, overwhelmed. We wanted human-in-the-loop technology to make their lives better

qualitativeBenefits.description: Preserved 27-year position as Korea's #1 customer service provider while enhancing capabilities
qualitativeBenefits.source: SKT maintained their 27-year leadership in customer service while preserving the human touch

qualitativeBenefits.description: Maintained regional support network with local dialects and cultural nuances
qualitativeBenefits.source: Claude demonstrated the cultural sensitivity needed for natural conversations across regional dialects
